adviseScripts.text: If you could create only one thing with sand,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: what would you make?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: A bust of you.
A model of the Seimeikai mansion.
Me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Can I take this to mean that you consider my face a work of art?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The Seimeikai mansion?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That's a rather unexpected answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd choose something you had more of a personal connection to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Sakura.
Sakura is fiddling with a camera.
There's only one shot left on this roll.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Can I take a picture of you, {AccountData.NickName}-kun?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'd prefer to take a picture with you.
Strike a pose.
Now that you mention it, I don't think I have any photos of just you and me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Then, I shall move closer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What kind of photo would you like to take?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, I would have regretted not taking it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to do another pose?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I can't quite see your face right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I take a plethora of photos together.
Since this is our first time at the beach together,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I feel that I should call you by a different name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What should I call you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Honey?
{AccountData.NickName}?
Isn't that what Viper calls you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to refer to you by the same nickname.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Isn't there anything else?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I don't believe I've ever called you just by your name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I can try...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: {AccountData.NickName}...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Strange... why do I feel so flush all of a sudden?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk about nicknames.
Should I depart from this place, I fear I shall dearly miss it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: During your time here, what has brought you the greatest delight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Everything I did with you.
Let me think for a moment.
I also enjoyed the time we spent together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: As each summer approaches,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I shall find myself reminiscing about the summer spent in your company.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You've done so much during your time here,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I can see why you'd need a while to think about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a productive counseling session.
During the barbecue,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spilled some sauce on my robe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Take it off.
I'll wash it for you. You can wear my shirt in the meantime.
No, I'd feel naked without my robe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to clean it with some water first.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, I appreciate you saying that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I absolutely adore this sweeter side of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It only increases my desire to make you completely mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Sakura.
Although Rosanna's swimsuit isn't quite to my taste,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I must admit
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: it exudes both boldness and charisma.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I prefer your swimsuit.
Yeah, I love it.
Hehe, so you like my swimsuit more?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That makes me really happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The more I think about it, the more I think we share the same preferences.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... So that is your preference, I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You're referring to the swimsuit, correct? Not Rosanna herself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about swimsuits.
I'm worried that once we head back to the Ark,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll start missing the ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's also a shame that I won't be able to wear this swimsuit anymore.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: We can go to a pool.
Let's come back next summer.
... But a swimming pool
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: isn't the same as an open ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Well, I guess I'll have to make do with the pool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'd love nothing more
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: than to go to the beach with you again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'm already looking forward to the next summer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a productive counseling session.
Sakura doesn't seem to have noticed my arrival.
*Knock knock*
Sorry, did I startle you?
Yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I was lost in my own thoughts for a moment
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: and didn't realize you were here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Why aren't you saying anything?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I didn't want to disturb you.
Hehe, you're such a sweetie.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a productive counseling session.
The sea is especially beautiful at night.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: If you have time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: would you like to have a drink with me in the moonlight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: How about a kiss?
I'll prepare the drinks.
... What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Do you say things like this to the others as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That won't be necessary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I've prepared a special drink for the occasion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Come then, let's have a drink together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I have a pleasant time with Sakura.
Mary gave me some new lip gloss today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Not only is it moisturizing, but it also has a wonderful scent.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Would you like some?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Only if you apply it for me.
No, thanks. I'm good.
Okay, fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you come a little closer, then?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... Just a little more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Would you perhaps consider applying a little?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: If your lips are too dry, they're liable to crack.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I spend the time applying some lip gloss.
Sakura is glancing at her phone with a look of consternation.
Is something wrong?
I'm picking out pictures to show Moran when I get back to the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Which pictures would you suggest I show her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Pictures of the ocean.
Pictures of sand castles.
Indeed, there's nothing quite as splendid as a picture of the ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I could show her all the pictures I took of the wildlife here:
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Dolphins, sea lions, and even flamingos.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It'd be nice if she were to join us at the beach next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I don't think Moran would be too interested in pictures of sand castles.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I should find something else to show her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spend time helping Sakura choose which pictures to show Moran.
Guilty gave me some coconut juice earlier today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Have you tried it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It's not to my liking.
It was absolutely delicious.
Same here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'd be okay with never trying it again,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but Guilty can't seem to get enough of that stuff.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a big fan, personally.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I guess everyone has their own preferences.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about coconut juice.
Here, I'd like for you to have this bracelet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I crafted it from seashells and conch shells...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I hope you like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll keep it as a memento.
I'll wear it every day.
Rather than treating it as a memento,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I would much prefer for you to wear it every day...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Since I made it with you in mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It was worth all the effort, then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I added in various seashells and conch shells that I thought would suit you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hurry and put it on your wrist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about the bracelet she made for me.
Getting my picture taken
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: isn't something that comes naturally to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What pose do you think suits me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Something graceful and dignified.
Something sexy and captivating.
That strikes me as something I can manage quite easily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll try a pose so tell me what you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: After all, I've no clue what I'm doing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I must confess, I am rather uncertain as to what pose that is
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: since nothing comes to mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure that's the type of pose that would suit me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I talk more about different types of poses.
{AccountData.NickName}-kun,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: you may not believe this,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but I think I saw a ghost here yesterday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Actually, I think that might have been me.
Don't worry, I'll protect you.
... I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Frankly speaking, I'm not particularly afraid of ghosts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: In my opinion, humans are far more frightening.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: You will?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: That puts my mind at ease.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I shall do everything within my power to keep you safe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: no matter what.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about ghosts.
I've decided to have a water fight with Rosanna later,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: and she's pretty confident that she'll win.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: No way, you'll win.
Who knows, Rosanna might just beat you?
Hehe, glad to hear you're on my side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Now that I have your support,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure to win.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: So that's how you feel...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... It seems I must defeat Rosanna, by any means necessary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about water fights.
Take a look at this, {AccountData.NickName}-kun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I found this tiny turtle today while I was building a sand castle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Isn't it adorable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It looks just like you.
It's so cute.
Me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: How so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What part do you think resembles me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you think so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Rosanna and Viper didn't like it. In fact, they were grossed out by it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The way it dawdles about so slowly is simply adorable to behold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: It sure would be nice if I was able to take this little guy with me back to the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Oh well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about turtles.
We really got to enjoy the seaside a great deal while we were up here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Of all the things we did here,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: what do you remember the most?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Building sand castles with you.
Surfing with Rosanna.
That's my fondest memory as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I didn't even realize how fast time was passing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: ... There will be another day where we can build sand castles, won't there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I despise physical activities,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but it seems like you get a real kick out of them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Sakura.
Phew...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Jackal asked me to teach her how to build a sand castle,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: but all she does is eat sand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: The easiest option would be to give up.
Try mixing some of the bait you made into the sand.
Giving up isn't in my vocabulary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I will get her to make the perfect sand castle if it's the last thing I do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: There has to be a better method. I just have to think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... That's not a bad idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Jackal does despise that bait...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to give it a try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Sakura and I have a conversation about Jackal.
*Splash splash*
Sakura is splashing water with her feet.
Join her and splash along.
Splash her with water.
Haha, hey there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I find splashing water at the beach to be quite relaxing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Care to join me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I didn't want to get wet, so that's why I've only been dipping my toes in the water.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: But thanks to you, I'm completely soaked now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sakura

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Sakura.
